name: Angela King
text: The pizza was pretty good. The tokens for games are affordable and my kids had a blast. We took kids ages 2-16 and they all enjoyed it.

name: David Pemberton
text: I'm not going to tear your rating up over this, just want to bring it to your attention. First visit ever to this location AND a peter piper pizza. I don't drink soda, so I ask for a cup for water. Your water cups are kind of silly. I've ‚Ä¶More

name: Boss Boss
text: Buffet is best daily special around..great tasting pizza!!

name: William Bortins
text: It's ok pizza. It's ok environment. It's clean and cheap. Better pizza in Oklahoma.

name: Marcia Randle
text: So much fun. Went at night and there were very few people so we had the game room to ourselves. The pizza was fresh. The employees were courteous. Great place for small entertainment!

name: Auto Auction Rebuilds
text: This place is Awesome! Fast service, great food and great games!

name: Tender Sheep
text: My son adores this place. The games are fun and the atmosphere is good, better than Chuck E. Cheeses. Sadly I hate the corn meal dust they put on the bottom of the pizza but you can get the personal pan pizzas without it on there. I've ‚Ä¶More

name: jJohn Eyman
text:
Was very impressed with the staff, Pizza was OK but very well priced and much better than CiCi's . Salad Bar was rather skimpy on variety.  Was super clean and comfortable. Serving time for the Buffet was only 11:00 to   2:00 Monday through Friday. would like to see an evening buffet.
I will go back

name: Larry Knox
text: Customer service was excellent. I spoke with two different managers both of which were very helpful informing me of times, services and things to do with bringing my children and grandchildren. The pizzas are good and the buffet was great. ‚Ä¶More

name: Judith Goodwin
text: Very clean and well-maintained. Staff was friendly and helpful. Pizza was good and served quickly. Nice game room and great set-up for parties. I recommend!

name: Tamara Kizer
text: The staff the is so sweet and kind. They went out of their to make my daughters birthday fun. The manager was amazing. Anyone needing a fun place for a party i highly recommend

name: Michael New
text: I did not eat here, but the pizza looked and smelled really good. I took my child to attend a birthday party, and the staff took care of the large group with ease. The gaming area is small, but the games were new and exciting for the kids. This place was also very clean.

name: Clara Edwards
text: I went at lunch on a Saturday, so it was pretty busy. I think 3 birthday parties were happening at the same time. There was not an available game attendant, and some games were broken. Pizza is good, though.

name: radboysx4
text: Our experience was amazing. The staff was kind and hardworking. We liked the pizza, breadsticks, and desserts. The games were a lot of fun. We like that there is a buffet option, as well. We will definitely be back.

name: Mr.D Woodz
text: Went for buffet and manager from Dallas,Texas took my order and actually said thanks for coming in and thank you with a pretty smile. Food was good,choices of pizza was okay due to ending of buffet but manger was back there in kitchen prep ‚Ä¶More

name: Joshua Conrad
text: Games, events, decent pizza, good prices. Peter Piper Pizza is like a smaller, funnier, less chaotic Chuckee Cheese, and I mean that in the best way. I far prefer their food and service and the atmosphere is so much calmer and friendlier.

name: Roby Pettit
text: We went today and Cory had a bad attitude right when we got in the door. She was again 3 times after that as my wife and I either got our pizzas or asked about our dessert. I saw an employee dig his hands in the toppings and he wasnt ‚Ä¶More

name: Tonji Lewis
text: Nice staff.  Food was ok. I was there for a kids birthday party and everyone went out of their way to accommodate us. Very clean place too!

name: A McClintock
text: The pizza is amazing! The place is clean. Atmosphere is welcoming and fun! They've got a good arcade in the back behind glass filled with new games. The lunch buffet is totally worth it (weekdays only).

name: LaShonda Osei
text: Had my baby's 2nd birthday party.. Food was fresh and delicious.. Game Room Small wish it was bigger, but overall great place.

name: Koventry Davis
text: I called to order a pizza and was placed on a very long hold. I finally hung up and called right back the same girl was more than willing to take my order. I asked to speak to the manager. The girl was sweet but it's not the first time I've ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher Jay
text: Pizza hot and fresh. Bread stocks came out before pizza and was hot and fresh. Very clean restaurant. Games are good for the acarde. If you have kids over 5 but under 12 they will enjoy.

name: Pepsi Caligone
text: The pizza was good. They have games that the other pizza places do not have. So, it was a nice break from the traditional games. I only wish their buffet times where longer. Kids had fun.

name: JasmineLovely123
text: Had a great time with family. The arcade was great for my little ones pizza tasted great.

name: Robert Henderson
text: Taken my kid to several parties here, pretty great local place. I do appreciate that I have the option to get a beer and it is also fun to play games with the kiddo.

name: Glenda Carr
text: Had a great time! Pizza was very good, staff were excellent and the game room so much fun. Highly recommend for anyone!

name: Amanda Johnson
text: The pizza sauce is on the sweet side, don't really like that very much but the pizza wasn't bad. Good bread sticks. The games are reasonably priced. Good place for families.

name: Brandi
text: We had my sons 1st birthday party here. We had a blast. The pizza is ok, but the atmosphere was great. The pizza could be better, but the kids were more interested in playing the games. The games cost 2-3 tokens a piece, so your tokens go ‚Ä¶More

name: Charlene Delaney
text: Cleanliness and super friendly staff. Food is better than I expected. Tad bit loud of course but what do you expect it's a children place üòä they need to work on some of their games and keep the tickets stocked up so that way customers don't have to keep asking them to fill but other than that great place to take your kids.

name: Michael Craft
text: Peter Piper Pizza, this is a decent pizza restaurant. They have games, pizza, wings, beer, soda, salads, desserts and friendly staff.There are plenty of TV's to watch while you are waiting for your food. They have many different toppings and fresh mushrooms.

name: Kevin De Sena
text: Kids had a awesome time. My 13 yr old hustled the employees at a couple of games and won everyone free icecream and a tour of the kitchen!! Staff was AWESOME.

name: Dustin Bean
text: Great place for little people parties! There were at least 3 birthday parties going on when we were there, including ours. Plenty of room, lots of new games and the pizza was ok. It's funny seeing the same games here that are at Dave and Buster.

name: Ashley Ladan
text: Maybe i‚Äôm just used to CiCi‚Äôs but seemed like the selection of pizza and salad choices was super lame. But i like how spacious the place was.

name: J B
text:
Great pizza and service. Some of the games are broken but they were great about refunding on the spot and quickly.
Was here for a bday party and had a lot of fun for a good price.

name: Mable Berry
text: It was good the pizza was fresh and hot.the guy in there making the puzzle was on  it.

name: Katherine Juden
text: Pizza is good.  Prizes are typical for this type of place.  You play to have fun not to spend $20 winning 5 dumdums.  2 year old and 4 year old had fun.

name: Wayne Smith
text: Love going to Peter Piper.  They did mess up on our pizza but they saw their mistake and gave us our correct order and they have the mistake for free.  My grandson loves to go there for the games.  Great pizza, great atmosphere.

name: Sharon Crane
text: Excellent experience, we did a walk in party for a 5year old on 12/4/2016 at the Del City location, the staff was amazing! Even though we didn't book the party ahead of time, they all went out of their way to provide the parents and kids with the full peter piper birthday experience. A+++

name: Cam's Captures
text: It was fun! Workers there were really nice. I suggest going!

name: Anna Ratliff
text: The pizza was good, really really cheesy. The games were a good value and my son had a lot of fun. The store was clean and not to noisy like most pizza and game places.

name: Angie Arlo
text: I remember this place from my childhood.  The pizza used to be great!  Yesterday's pizza, was ok, the place was clean and staff was friendly.  Overall as good place.

name: Stan Smith
text:
Ok pizza if you like thin. Thin topping that is.
I seen more toppings on a pizza from a easy bake oven.

name: david gravett
text: I have been their and had a very good experience, I had good pizza and friendly service, I had a large Italian sausage with extra cheese and black olives, and a large pepperoni with extra cheese and mushrooms. It was good. I will recommend this Del city location.

name: April Shelton
text: Great place to bring the kids for a little fun. Good üçï and good games for the price. We will definitely return.

name: Benjamin Wise
text: Good pizza.   Basic salad bar but fresh.

name: Ricky Palacios
text: It was great like always paw patrol on the big screens me and my wife eat in peace great games and a friendly staff

name: Alisha Norton
text: Great pizza, family friendly, and games for all ages. Me and my family enjoyed this place. We are thinking about have our son bay party here.

name: Norman Velasquez
text: Great experience. Awesome customer service. I was just visiting. If I were from Oklahoma I would definitely be back.

name: sylvia hall
text: More sauce than ingredients on pizza. Regular crust taste like cardboard thick crust soggy ry from sauce. Had a five ingredient pizza but still had no flavor. Workers were freindly and the  cheese bread were tasty. Salad WA a bit wilted and ranch dressing was salty. Will not be back

name: Mark Clarke
text: Great place great service great food. After reading some of the peoples reviews about how they like Cici's nasty low quality cheese and hunts sauce on cardboard buffet pizza, that's because they want all you can eat for $5.00 it's Quality ‚Ä¶More

name: Emily Harris

name: Montana Smith
text: I've been going to this Peter Pipper's Pizza location since it opened.  Very clean establishment. The pizza is great and the employees are very friendly, the cut-and-call guy and the game room host guy are my favorites! BEST PLACE EVER!

name: Jennie VanHooser
text: Food is ok. Staff is unhelpful...when you can even find someone. The facility itself is usually clean. ChuckECheese is a better bang for your buck!
